actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain individuals over age 65 who have public retirement system income to elect to compute their credit for the elderly under prior law.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to modify the age and filing requirements pertaining to the credit for the elderly for persons receiving public retirement income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow certain individuals over age 65 who have public retirement system income to elect to compute their credit for the elderly under prior law.
